variable.name: FASTING
variable.comment: Any caloric intake was considered a break in fasting and coding as non-fasting (fasting=no), examples: milk or sugar in coffee, juice, candy, gum

variable.name: URALBUMI
variable.comment: The minimum detectable limit of this assay is 3.0, so any value below 3.0 was set to 3.0
variable.value: Unknown or did not have urine sample
